name: The Last Shape
description:
Sink into the Breathtaking Atmosphere of a Destroyed World

Somewhere, among an endless void there was a universe named Gaos. The universe was inhabited by 4 races of creatures that were similar to geometrical figures. The relationships between them were hostile. The whole world was destroyed as a result of the war.




Adventure Through the Looking Glass

Finally spirits of the dead have been reincarnated as the last shape, that was a little cube, which gave them an ability to see what they've done when they were alive in a different light.


The game has many dark floors that the little square has to go through and when it reaches the end, at this moment the spirits of creatures are ready to be reborn in an entirely new universe. At the end all spirits leave the last little cube behind and disappear.

Features:

  • Classic 2d hand-drawn platformer with all the modern trimmings.
  • Created by one person.
  • Outstanding arts
  • Forge your own path by dashing forward!
  • Original design of an alien world
